name: Car & Driver
description:
Do you, or someone you know, really like watching a car get wrecked?

Intended to be a racing game where you didn't control the car, but turned into golf with a physically simulated car over the course of development.

Made for the MashUp Game Jam 2 with the theme Unconventional Means using Unity, Blender, GIMP and Ableton.

Controls:

  • Use WASD to line up your shot
  • Press Space to swing
  • Use Q and E to cycle through clubs
  • While in the air, you can use WASD to admire your work
